nodes.text: A humanoid, saurian species lived on a Fantanine strip-mining planet. They had red skin and white eyes. The Fantanines tried to domesticate them, but they could not take to the work, and started shipping them off-world. Lando Calrissian, when he arrived to re-take possession of the admin facility, noticed such as shipment, and intervened. He freed the natives from the shipment, but it led to him losing his control of Cloud City.
The natives appear in Marvel Comics' 2019 issue Age of Rebellion - Lando Calrissian 1.
